name: Drillbeak Wurm
effect: Persistent: Any player suffers 1 damage. Gravehold suffers 1 damage.

name: Carriode Colony
effect:
Immediately: This minion suffers damage equal to the number of players in the game.
Persistent: Unleash.

name: Chaos Orb
effect:
To Discard: Spend 6 Æ.

Power 3: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 4 damage.

name: Disorient
effect: Unleash. Any player suffers 1 damage and discards a card in hand. If that card is a gem, Gravehold suffers 2 damage.

name: Rend
effect: Unleash. Gravehold suffers 1 damage. Any player suffers 2 damage.

name: Unnerving Howl
effect: Power 2: Unleash. Any player discards two gems in hand.

name: Ceaseless Darkness
effect:
To Discard: Spend 5 Æ.

Power 2: Unleash. Any player suffers 3 damage. Any player discards a card in hand.

name: Aether Shock
effect: Unleash. The player with the most prepped spells suffers 1 damage and discards a prepped spell.

name: Decimate
effect: Unleash twice and any players gains 2 charges. OR Gravehold suffers 4 damage.

name: Blind Enigma
effect: Persistent: Any player suffers 1 damage. If the nemesis tier is 2 or higher, that player suffers 2 additional damage.

name: Planar Collision
effect:
To Discard: Discard two prepped spells.

Power 2: Unleash twice.

name: Spirit Snare
effect:
To Discard: Discard a card in hand that costs 5 Æ or more.

Power 3: Unleash. Any player discards a spell in hand and suffers 2 damage.

name: Dement
effect: Unleash twice. Any player suffers 1 damage and places their most expensive card in hand on top of their deck.

name: Decay
effect: Unleash twice. Any player or Gravehold suffers 3 damage.

name: Culling Scythe
effect:
To Discard: Spend 7 Æ.

Power 2: Unleash. The player with the lowest life suffers 4 damage.

name: Fugue
effect: Any player discards three cards in hand and suffers 2 damage.

name: Volcanic Zala
effect: Persistent: Gravehold suffers 3 damage. OR Any player loses 2 charges.

name: Portal Guardian
effect: Persistent: Unleash. Any player suffers 1 damage.

name: Obliterating Meteor
effect:
To Discard: Discard four cards in hand.

Power 1: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 3 damage.

name: Mutilate
effect: Unleash. The players collectively discard two prepped spells. Any player suffers 2 damage.

name: Needlemaw
effect: Persistent: Gravehold suffers 2 damage.

name: Morbid Gyre
effect:
To Discard: Spend 7 Æ.

Power 1: Unleash twice. The players collectively discard three cards in hand.

name: Gravity Splinter
effect:
To Discard: Spend 7 Æ.

Power 2: Unleash twice. The player with the fewest opened breaches suffers 3 damage.

name: Eliminate
effect: Unleash three times. OR Gravehold suffers 6 damage. OR Any player suffers 5 damage.

name: Crushing Storm
effect:
To Discard: Destroy two opened breaches.

Power 1: Unleash three times.

name: Gnashing Maw
effect: Power 2: Unleash. The player with the most expensive prepped spell destroys it. If that spell costs 4 Æ or less, Unleash and any player suffers 3 damage.

name: Disperse
effect: Unleash twice. Any player suffers 2 damage and destroys their most expensive card in hand.

name: Gore
effect: Unleash twice. The player with the most expensive card in hand discards three cards in hand. Then, for each card in that player's hand that costs 2 Æ or more, that player suffers 2 damage.

name: Hex of Destruction
effect:
To Discard: Spend 8 Æ.

Power 2: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 4 damage. Any player destroys the top four cards of their deck.

name: Eternal Watcher
effect: Persistent: Any player suffers 3 damage. If this minion has 6 or less life, it gains 3 life.

name: Sunder
effect: Gravehold suffers 4 damage and the player with the lowest life suffers 4 damage. OR Shuffle all of the nemesis turn order cards into the turn order deck.

name: Topple
effect: Unleash twice. Gravehold suffers 4 damage.

name: Monstrosity of Omens
effect:
When damage is dealt to this minion, reduce that damage to 1.

Persistent: Gravehold suffers damage equal to this minion's current life.

name: Doom Aegis
effect:
To Discard: Spend 7 Æ.

Power 1: The player with the most charges suffers 4 damage and loses all of their charges.
